title: Because my league dosnt start im forced to wait 1 hour and 40m in total to get into games again
body: League crashed on startup and wouldnt close for 5m , got into game 10m we end up winning and then after the game i get leaver buster ... 20 minutes  wait is just to long to wait, i have to waste 1 hour and 40m of my time to try and get rid of this leaver buster, when riots client screwed up, they need to fix the time you have to wait or the client. Also why is it 20m if i have not been affected by it in the last 4 months riot?

replies.body:
I know it can be really sucky to be in low priority que. 

However, your 10 minute disconnect still affected 9 other players (even though it was not your fault). Your placement into a low priority queue shows that you have left a number of match-made games, and all of those times probably can't be put down to "Riot's fault".  Because leaving is a regular occurrence to you, I would suggest addressing the issues that are causing you to leave. 

* Is it time to upgrade your computer?
* Is it time to upgrade your internet?
* Are you starting games when you don't have a full hour to commit?
* Are you inclined to rage quit when things go bad?

If you would like some reading material during your wait, I suggest you read this [update to the leaver buster system](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/updates-leaverbuster) as well as the [full leaver buster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).

Dude the problem isnt my computer its my league client, and im pretty sure other people have had these problems but waiting 20m for a mere 10m disconect dosnt add up and its not like i gave up and just let my team lose, i played my dam ass off also thanks for the links you have provided

If the league client works perfectly for me, and horribly for you, then one must conclude that there is some outside contributing factor. Like your computer. Clean the shit out. Get rid of your porn. Clean up the registry (I bet you haven't done that in ages if at all) uninstall all that software you haven't used in 18 months. Disable half of the software that starts up automatically that you don't need. Simple shit like this will fix your issues. I'm sure of it
